entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Amos
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Val-d'Or Regional Airport 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: E 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
